id: <A unique identifier for the Verifiable Credential>
issuer: <The URL or Decentralized Identifier (DID) of the entity issuing the credential>
issuanceDate: <The date and time when this credential was issued, formatted as ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ)>
expirationDate: <The date and time when this credential will expire, formatted as ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ)>

credentialSubject.clientID: <The Decentralized Identifier (DID) or other unique identifier of the person receiving the credential>
credentialSubject.dateOfBirth: <The date of birth of the credential holder, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD>
credentialSubject.ofLegalAge: <Boolean value (true/false) indicating whether the user meets the legal drinking age>

proof.type: <The cryptographic signature algorithm used to sign this credential>
proof.created: <The timestamp when the credential was signed, in ISO 8601 format>
proof.proofPurpose: <Describes the intent of the proof, typically 'assertionMethod' for verifying the authenticity of the credential>
proof.verificationMethod: <A reference to the issuer's public key or verification method>
proof.proofValue: <A cryptographic signature proving the authenticity of this credential>
